text: Godɨn nɨghnɨzir aghuim ko an fofozimɨn, God kamaghɨn fo, nguazir kamɨn itir gumazamiziba uan fofozimɨn tuavimɨn me Godɨn fofozim inighan kogham. Kamaghɨn, God tuavir igharazir mam men akuraghasa anemɨsefe. Kar, me “mɨgɨrɨgɨar onganim” arɨzir akam, e aneakuri. Gumaziba akar kam baragha nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn iti, ezɨ God men akurvasi.
